osvSchema.details: Vulnerability in the Oracle Trade Management product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: Offer LOV).  Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.3-12.2.13. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Trade Management.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in  unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle Trade Management accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 7.5 (Confidentiality impacts).  CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).
